name: Vendly
tag_list: mobile, social-comerce, social-e-comerce, trends, coolhunting, social-media
overview:
We are a start-up from Santiago, Chile. We are creating an aplication that will end with the complications of selling and buying anything from and with your friends throught your social networks.

We believe that our friends are the key to a safe shopping experience and that by tapping into our social graphs we are able to find potential buyers for almost anything!

Think about when you were young… there was always that friend of yours who had that special toy you always wanted. Apparently, as time went by, he lost interest in it… so hey! How about buying it from him now?

Well, this is were Vendly comes in! We will help your friend post throughout all his social networks, and you´ll finally get the chance to buy that special thing from him!

Or how about if you produce your own products? Isn´t it hard to maintain an on-line store? Having to get ranked on eBay, or just getting people to visit your site?

With Vendly you can get around this! Just Snap, Share and Sell! Simply said, simply done!

You will only have to use your mobile phone to capture a picture of what you want to sell. Choose your sharing options, send it to your Facebook timeline, or your Twitter stream, and BAM! All your friends get access to your offering.

Oh! And wait! Thats not all! This is the best part! With Vendly, you can even share your earnings and reward your friends if they help you find a buyer for your Vends (we call your posted items Vends.. get it? Vendly, Vends and Venders!).
